articles.title: Recycling Old Tech Can Save You Money - CNET
articles.description: It can be hard to say goodbye to old devices when trade-in value is low. But recycling sales can earn you discounts on new tech.
articles.content: For the past five years, my old iPhone X sat unused in a cabinet, the corner of the screen blemished by a shatter from when I dropped it without a case. It serves no purpose. But Apple's trade-in pro… [+1243 chars]
